Sorry was Megaton yours too?

--- LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote:
> OOC:  SHUT THE F*** UP  YOU NEWB!  Necromancer was
> MINE.  I GAVE Necromancer
> to Cyberwolf.  Also, if I mentioned that the
> Lavacons were mine, you'd say
> they weren't because I gave them away too.  WRONG. 
> Necromancer  and Hell
> Drak were  brother and sister, giant dragons  for
> beast  mode.  In a feud
> with Decadel.  Decadel captured Hell Drak,
> Necromancer had the Maximals help
> him save her.  Hell Drak was possessed by Decadel
> with his special worm
> devices, and Decadel attempted to enslave many bots.
>  I'm sure not many
> remember  that.  NECROMANCER WAS TRULY ALWAYS MY
> CHARACTER.  HE WAS GIVEN
> AWAY, BECAUSE I WAS FORCED  AWAY FROM THE RPG.  I
> WAS SHUT OUT, BY EVERYBODY
> HERE, AND THUS FOR A LONG TIME I HAD PERSONAL ISSUES
> DUE TO THE TORMENT. 
> Anyway, I'm back, and the moral of this message is: 
> KNOW YOUR FACTS, DO
> SOME RESEARCH BEFORE YOU  SPEAK.
> 
> -------Original Message-------
> 
> From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Date: August 05, 2002 09:12:50 PM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: ooC: people...
> 
> OOC:  YOU BIG FAT LING b*)(h NECROMANCER WAS C.
> WOLF'S!
> 
> --- LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote:
> > OOC:  Hey, watch it there.  (This is not intended
> to
> > be a flame)  First of
> > all, I just wanted to have an interesting
> entrance,
> > you know, make  people
> > notice.  Also, as for Skulletron/Slaughter having
> > potential, that is a big
> > understatement, if you look  back on the olden
> days 
> >  of NBWRPG(the better
> > days) I had the "potential" to be one of the top
> > RPers.  As I have ranted on
> > about before, I am nowhere  near to being new to
> > this RPG.  But thank you
> > for the compliment, Skulletron was my first
> > character, and this is the.....
> > 3rd time, I believe....that I have brought him
> back.
> >  I have always taken my
> > characters seriously, and unlike my buddy
> Hollywood
> > Narrator over there(this
> > is not an insult  to you, HN) I always do
> "serious"
> > characters.  Some of my
> > best works include Skulletron, Decadel,
> Necromancer,
> > Hell Drak, and.....
> > actually, I consider just about all of my old
> > characters to be good works. 
> > I am also impressed with the characters and plots
> I
> > see now, and I look
> > forward to bringing back old characters, debuting
> > brand new ones,  and
> > interacting with you guys...

> > RPG, not a 
> > slapstick movie, so if I see another post/exchange
